description.en: Developing a web-based application that allows customers to schedule appointments with providers and use their services, post a review and automate a ranking of the bests providers.
Coded a native Android & iOS application to manage personal finances, allowing to store records such as expenses and income, automatizing balances and reports.
Developed a secure RESTful API to simulate a virtual library where users can post books, create collections and share reviews.
Crafted a RESTful API to manage personal tasks creating to-do lists and filtering by status, category or tags.
Built a desktop application that allows users to post thoughts through little texts, watch content from other users and search posts by keywords.
Designed a website that calculates totality based by denomination cash amount, useful for business with high cash flow in Colombia.
Designed a website and implemented a dependency to print little texts like quick notes or impromptu invoices.
